attributes.action: Prohibit health workers smoking in their work clothes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A district nurse, of my acquaintance, smokes whilst wearing her uniform. Even worse she puffs away merrily at the wheel of her car as she drives to visit her clients, which of course is illegal. How can health care workers advise their clients, with any conviction, not to smoke if they stink of cigarette smoke themselves?
